Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that AOC submitted legislation to ban the open carrying of firearms in the U.S. In reality, the mentioned bill, H.R. 6556, has nothing to do with firearms and was authored by a different representative.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a false story published by a satirical website, Daily World Update.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that AOC submitted legislation to ban the open carrying of firearms without providing any evidence or credible sources to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation to the claim is that it is entirely false and based on misinformation spread by a satirical website.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of AOC by falsely attributing the submission of a bill banning open carrying of firearms to her.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by incorrectly stating the details of the bill and misattributing it to AOC.
